name: Machine Learning
body:
Various projects on different machine learning techniques include developing **"Multilevel Neural Network"**, **"Various Regression and Classification techniques**.  

1) [_**Hand Written Digit Classification**_](https://github.com/mohitarora06/Hand-Written-Digit-Classification):- MNIST dataset of handwritten digits is classified using Multilayer Perceptron Neural Network. A single hidden layer is used to classify the digits in the data set. Each pixel of an image is considered as the feature for the model. Weights for the hidden layer are learnt using back-propagation technique and regularization is implemented to avoid over fitting of the model. Accuracy of around **95%** is achieved.
